snippet: 20th Century Fox is ramping up its efforts to bring together conventional cinema and virtual reality with the scheduled commercial releases of experiences to complement films like “The Martian.”
abstract: Twentieth Century Fox and its internal Fox Innovation Lab are readying release of so-called virtual reality experience; set to debut in 2016, project will use special headsets from Oculus and other devices to integrate blockbuster films with virtual reality techniques.
lead_paragraph: 20th Century Fox is ramping up its efforts to bring together conventional cinema and virtual reality with the scheduled commercial releases of experiences to complement films like “The Martian.”

headline.print_headline: Virtual Reality Has Liftoff From Fox Innovation Lab
headline.main: With ‘The Martian,’ Virtual Reality Has Liftoff From Fox Innovation Lab
